text: The board of directors of state-owned Oil And Natural Gas Corporation Ltd. (ONGC) has approved signing of definitive agreements for buying debt- laden Gujarat State Petroleum Corp Ltd.’s (GSPC) entire 80 percent stake in the KG-basin natural gas block for $1.2 billion.ONGC will pay $995.26 million for three discoveries in the KG-OSN-2001/3 block that are under trial production since August 2014. Another $200 million will be paid for six other discoveries for which GSPC has been finalising an investment plan to bring them to production.
title: ONGC Board Approves Pact To Acquire GSPC Stake For $1.2 Billion
